shortDescription: I work in an outsourced project at the Jalasoft Company
description: I worked in a E-Procurement Web Application. This project was outsourced to Jalasoft and I was one of the engineers assigned to that team. Sadly, I cannot add images of this project due to an NDA

shortDescription: I took a Comertial Software Development Specialization
description: A Comercial Software Development Specialization in which I worked on an internal project for Fundacion Jala. I developed a Micro Frontend with React JS using Material UI and a MicroServices based backend with SpringBoot in Java. Sadly, I cannot add images of this project due to an NDA

shortDescription: A small and badly coded Tic-tac-toe game for browser
description: A Small Tic-Tac-Toe implementation done during my Fundacion Jala time. Mainly done to play with CSS. (I agree, It's ugly)

shortDescription: An Android Mobile App centered in menstrual health
description: I worked as a Mobile Dev in this Android Mobile App centered in menstrual health. I did some refactoring and worked in the calendar view
Some DeepLearning projects I have written in Python. It's always in progress since I'm always learning new things

shortDescription: A small Neural Network implementation for Java
description: As a free time project, NN4J is an attempt to implement a Torch inspired framework for Java.
As a free time project, I sometimes program small snippets in Rust to practice my coding skills and learn another language.
